meta.job_title: 45343 Senior Associate, Anti Money Laundering/Prevention/Know Your Client

duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and ensure accuracy of client reports, escalating complex issues when necessary.
Maintain current understanding of global issues, risks, and events affecting client risk level.
Communicate with internal and external stakeholders to resolve issues and update client profiles.
Provide guidance to less experienced staff and contribute to team goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree or equivalent education and experience. Applicable local/regional licenses or certifications as required.
